mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file_board (title, nickname, content, create_dt, user_seq, file, price) VALUES (#{title}, #{nickname}, #{content}, CURRENT_TIME(), #{user_seq}, #{file}, #{price})
INSERT INTO file (orgName, savedName, savedPath, create_dt) VALUES ( #{orgName}, #{savedName}, #{savedPath}, CURRENT_TIME() )
mapper.select: SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY create_dt DESC) AS rownum FROM file_board WHERE status='N' ORDER BY create_dt DESC
SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY file.seq) AS rownum, sb.* FROM file file INNER JOIN kahyun.file_board sb ON file.savedName = sb.file
select file.*, sb.accept_yn FROM file INNER JOIN file_board sb ON file.savedName = sb.file WHERE file.savedName = #{savedName}

SELECT * FROM ( select sb.*, ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY sb.download_count desc) AS rownum, file.savedName FROM file_board AS sb INNER JOIN file ON file.savedName = sb.file WHERE sb.accept_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY sb.download_count desc) as sb WHERE 9 > sb.rownum

SELECT * FROM ( select sb.*, ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY sb.create_dt desc) AS rownum, file.savedName FROM file_board AS sb INNER JOIN file ON file.savedName = sb.file WHERE sb.accept_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY sb.create_dt desc) as sb WHERE 9 > sb.rownum
mapper.update: update file_board set download_count = download_count+1 where file = #{file}
